message.content: The generated code currently does not have any mechanism to handle posts, as was specified in the original task. A suggestion to improve the code would be to add endpoints for creating, retrieving, and deleting posts. These endpoints should also include appropriate authentication checks to ensure that only logged in users can create and delete posts.

function_call.name: write_files

message.content: The JWT token encoding in the login function is currently trying to decode the token immediately after encoding it. This is unnecessary and is causing an error because the token is already a string after encoding. The suggestion would be to remove the decoding step after the JWT token is encoded.
